vision.notes: Visual capabilities in Zephroniidae are not described in the provided context. Further research is needed.

chemoreception.notes: Chemoreception is likely crucial for finding food and mates in millipedes. Further research is needed to determine specific chemicals they are sensitive to.

mechanoreception.notes: Mechanoreception is important for sensing the environment and detecting predators. Likely through setae (bristles) and other sensory structures. Further research is needed to determine how this functions in this family.
